|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1D:1A |oui = 00:1D:1A |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = OvisLink |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 2012 |estprice = 20 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188ER; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== * '''baudrate''': 38400 {| class="wikitable" |- ! △ !! ■ !! ■ !! ■ |- | VCC || TX || RX || GND |} =====Boot log===== {{/boot log}} ===== Make a backup ===== * In the bootloader CLI execute the command:
flr 80500000 0 200000 * In your computer execute the command:
tftp 192.168.1.6 -m binary -c get flash-backup.bin This is a backup made with this procedure: [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1LsuWN-sVWcsnnoDasyzVT-9-tUrag5Rd w311ar-flash-backup.zip] ==Pictures==
